task.name: agent.tasks.ReconnoitreACrossingSite
task.description: For the agent, to move to a crossing site and reconnoiter it. Upon action termination, tha agent get informations about the water obstacle through informations available within the crossing site object (water velocity, depth, width). Such informations allows user to decide which bridge type to use to cross the water obstacle.

goal.description: To reconnoitre a crossing site in order to collect information about the crossing site.
